title: Hey Duggee - Hair Badge
cardDescription: The Hair Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 3 and has a hair brush surrounded by stars on it.
description: The Hair Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 3 and has a hair brush surrounded by stars on it.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: (3 sc, inc, 2 sc) x6, at last sc pull through with SC [42]
slst, (inc with hdc, 6 hdc) x6, last hdc is made into the first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.

content: sc to 2nd ch from hook, sc, 3 sc into last ch, continuing other side of chain, sc, 2 sc into first ch [8]
inc, sc, inc x3, sc, inc x2, slst with blue [14]
sc to 2nd ch from hook, 2 hdc, sc, slst to base of the handle
attach brown to back loop of 8th sc of the red part and continue blo, ch, sc, 2 hdc, sc, slst

content.content: Sew in place and hide the yarn ends.
Embroider three white stars. Make 5-pointed stars if you can since those are the right ones. I found them too hard, so I made 8-pointed stars.
